snippet: A former magistrate in Newport had changed a baby’s first name from Messiah to Martin, saying the name was a title held by only Jesus Christ.
lead_paragraph: A former magistrate in Newport had changed a baby’s first name from Messiah to Martin, saying the name was a title held by only Jesus Christ.

headline.main: Tennessee: Official Censured for Baby’s Name Change
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Official Censured For Baby’s Name Change
